content:
Howdy everyone :) Just found out about this stream so wanted to say hi.

I started learning Rust in Sept. 2020 and was amazed at how friendly and welcoming the community is. Professionally I work in the intersection between software engineering & deep learning, but I'm much more interested in the former than the latter.

Currently I'm contributing to clippy. Once I become productive there, I'd hope to explore cargo and compiler.
